text: The second series of I'm a Celebrity... Get Me out of Here! was broadcast on ITV from 28 April to 12 May 2003. Ant & Dec presented the main show on ITV, whilst Mark Durden-Smith and former contestant Tara Palmer-Tomkinson hosted the spin-off show I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out of Here... Now! on ITV2. The series was sponsored by the energy drink V. Category:I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! Category:2000s television seasons
title: I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (British series 2)
